title: No Decent Supports Now.

replies.body: Sorry you feel that way. I main support and I'm actually more than happy to play support. Every now and then I'll get bored playing the meta style supports cause frankly theres only so many. I'll play AP Zyra, poke'mundo or something else janky just to keep myself from going thresh crazy. I'm all about playing serious tho all you need do is ask me during champ select.

ill agree. support is a role that takes more skill to play right than adc. 
But there are reasons behind 'stealing kills' such as you wernt gonna get it anyway, might as well let the support get the kill and you get the assist.
And sometimes its warranted to deviate from a typical support buildpath towards the end depending on criteria. eg; Janna with a deathcap isnt going to be using that deathcap for damage, she will be using that to scale her spells to better help her team. Have you seen AP janna's shields? or her Heals? or the amount of slow percentage on her slow?
janna gets mejais for AP rush, not Dcap. 3k gold is WAY out of a supports budget for utility....

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=s6zndgV2,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2014-12-26T23:16:42.321+0000)
>
> janna gets mejais for AP rush, not Dcap. 3k gold is WAY out of a supports budget for utility....

yeah, i was just trying to put it into perspective for the player base that try tp build high AP items on supports. Then again, Dcap is 120+30% guaranteed AP, unlike mejias which requires you to not die, play smart and position well, something this guy and his teamates seem to lack or lack to understand
Yeah I understand what you mean here, but these people are last hitting kills, stealing cs, rushing items like DFG, taking ignite things like that, that aren't necessary at all.

ignite is one of the 2 summoner spells the support should take....exh or ign...depending on the type of lane they are playing or the type of enemy they are going to face.

you really want an ignite in a lane vs a raka, always...
I main support happy to play with you anytime

I prefer top,mid and jg but I will sup if needed I main Thresh I have a 60% win rate with him and usually set my adc up to carry I don't take kills unless I believe they won't get them and I will shield em even if its not needed and usually we will win bot without a gank because I know how to engage and when to use my e just as the q stuns finishes

It can be tricky, especially in normals where people may experiment or practice different things before using it in ranked. The only thing I can suggest would be to try and take advantage of whomever your partner is in the lane to try and get ahead. Its better to have at least a kill lane working than 2 separate champions trying to solo farm. Having said that, I've seen a lot of different bot configurations lately, especially Caitlyn/Ashe bot duo. 

I play support, so if you want to test out your adc you can drop me a message.

> [{quoted}](name=Grimey,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=s6zndgV2,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-26T15:22:11.945+0000)
>
> I've been trying to play a lot more of ADC lately but every time its the same thing. I get a support that doesn't want to support because they didn't call any other role in time and they either AFK half way through the game, feed or steal kills and go full damage. This is extremely unfair because I'm trying to play properly but all I have are people just trolling because they didn't get their way and ruining the experience for myself and my entire team basically. 
> 
> Anyone else got this problem or am I just whinging ? 
> -Thanks anyway, Grimey {{champion:96}}

Your whinging... 

Sometimes i get into a pub game and i dont feel like playing a passive 10-15minute laning phase on Sona so you can get your CS for a team fight at the 25-40min mark. I'll pick an aggressive laner like Annie or Rek or whoever the hell I want and guess what its completely my own prerogative on how and who I want to play. 
Believe it or not... there is no game user manual. So yeah ur whinging.

^^ the type of %%%% your complaining about. he proly goes AFK if the lane phase doesnt go as well as he hoped.

with any luck he will be banned and then learn that what he does isnt healthy for the game.

Fair enough, all we want is some fun in the end? But these people are taking cs and last hitting kills and kind of ruining the game for the team by feeding because they didn't get top and instead went 'Vi Support' to take farm and feed. Thats all I've seen, but fair point.

unless they have targons or you definitely arnt getting the cs, they shouldnt be doing that unless they have a very valid reason.
Sometimes supports are just trying to help by putting damage on to the target and with all the damage going down onto a target from elsewhere they cant help if their spell/aa is already in the air

All they need to do is varying up the bot lane meta, then this thread wouldn't exist in the first place.

And the players' mentality on the idea of "Supports" too.
